recovery.txt.name: recovery.txt
recovery.txt.content:
TEMPORAL DATA RECOVERY PROTOCOL
================================

1. Identify corrupted timeline segments
2. Locate all related data fragments
3. Cross-reference with known good timelines
4. Apply temporal reconstruction algorithms
5. Verify data integrity using checksum validation
6. Commit restored data to main timeline

CRITICAL: Always backup before restoration attempts

Approved Methods:
- File system navigation (cd, ls, pwd)
- Content inspection (cat, less, head, tail)
- Data search (grep, find)
- File operations (cp, mv, mkdir)
- Network diagnostics (ping, netstat)

Proceed with caution. Time is delicate.
